content.text: Not much, just making some bread
Oh thats cool, what kind of bread are you making?
Its a banana bread, I really like baking. What do you like to do?
I like hiking and staying fit. I am also on a diet right now.
That's cool, my favorite hobby is making boats. I love working with wood and I think boats are beautiful.
Wow, thats really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to make a boat.
It's not that hard, I'm sure you could do it!
I'd love to give it a try sometime. What's your favorite thing about baking?
I love the smell of fresh bread and I love being able to make something delicious for my family.
That's so sweet! It sounds like you really enjoy baking.
Yeah, I do! It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I can see why, it sounds like it would be really therapeutic.
It is! I love getting lost in my baking and just forgetting about everything else for a while.
That sounds amazing. I'm definitely going to have to try it sometime.
